Characters
View On FortressMaximus.io

Sergeant Hound - Infantry - Recon

  1. Say Sergeant Hound has an Armor, and I play another Armor to replace that one. Will his ability trigger?
    Yes. “When you upgrade this” means when any new upgrade is put onto Sergeant Hound.
